name: Ultra Street Fighter II:The Final Challenger...
description: Introducing the completely revamped Mega Man 11 Ver. from Kotobukiya! Relive iconic moments from the cherished series with this figure that captures the classic look. With interchangeable face parts, hands, a buster, and powerful charge shot effect, you can recreate unforgettable scenes from the game.The helmet off version offers a new level of detail. Effortlessly pose Mega Man with the included charge shot and sliding effects. The figure's 3mm joint holes allow seamless integration with optional accessories for dynamic action poses. This Mega Man model kit is the perfect addition to any Mega Man collection!
